name: USCoreReqAllergyResponder
title: US Core 4.0.0 Requirements for US Core Responder returning AllergyIntolerance
description: US Core 4.0.0 Requirements for US Core Responder returning AllergyIntolerance

statement.label: us-core-req-allergy-responder-01
statement.requirement: The US Core Responder **SHALL** support the AllergyIntolerance read operation and return, if present, a valid and conformant US Core 4.0.0 AllergyIntolerance resource instance.

statement.label: us-core-req-allergy-responder-02
statement.requirement: The US Core Responder **SHALL** support the AllergyIntolerance search operation and return, if present, valid and conformant US Core 4.0.0 AllergyIntolerance resource instance(s).

statement.label: us-core-req-allergy-responder-02-a
statement.requirement: The US Core Responder **SHALL** support the AllergyIntolerance search parameter 'patient'.

statement.label: us-core-req-allergy-responder-02-b
statement.requirement: The US Core Responder **MAY** support the AllergyIntolerance search parameter 'clinical-status'.

statement.label: us-core-req-allergy-responder-02-c
statement.requirement: The US Core Responder **SHOULD** support the AllergyIntolerance search parameter combination of 'patient+clinical-status'.

statement.label: us-core-req-allergy-responder-02-d
statement.requirement: The US Core Responder **SHALL** support the AllergyIntolerance search parameter _revinclude 'Provenance:target'.

statement.label: us-core-req-allergy-responder-03
statement.requirement: The US Core Responder **SHOULD** support the AllergyIntolerance vread and history-instance operations.

statement.label: us-core-req-allergy-responder-04
statement.requirement: The US Core Responder **MAY** support the AllergyIntolerance create, update, patch, delete and history-type operations.
